title: Mediterranean-Style Slow Cooker Lamb Shanks
ingredients: ['4 lamb shanks', '1 tablespoon gyros seasoning', '1 teaspoon steak seasoning', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '115g aubergine and garlic spread, such as baba ganoush', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1/2 tablespoon capers', '500ml beef stock', 'Garlic Sauce', '100g natural yoghurt', '1 teaspoon garlic paste', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 spring onion, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon dried dill', 'salt and pepper to taste']
